p: Activism isn’t a sprint, nor is it a marathon. It is a relay race, and it is my time to pass the baton. While this sage observation has been made about transgender advocacy by Emily Gorcenski and climate justice by Jane Fonda, it can be equally applied to clinical social work activism through my editorship of the Clinical Social Work Journal (CSWJ). Much has changed within social work and the larger mental health profession since I assumed the Editor-in-Chief position in March 2007.
